participant_1.background:
I spend time alone to reflect on my life and what I want to achieve.
I read everything I could about my family history.
I love bananas because they are a quick and easy snack that can give me a boost of energy during my long runs.
i used to work for monsanto.
i drive a four wheel drive vehicle.

participant_2.background:
I am a mystery buff and live in London.
I am not rich, but I am fortunate enough to have parents who support my passion for filmmaking.
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.
I have a collection of rocks and minerals from all over the world.
I wake up early, work a full day, then practice my music in the evening.

content.text: I'm good, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well! I just finished reading a book about my family history. It was really interesting.
That sounds like a great read! I love learning about my family history. Do you have any interesting stories from your family's past?
Yes, I do! My great-grandfather was a farmer, and he once had to fight off a bear that was trying to attack his livestock.
Wow, that's amazing! I'm glad he was able to protect his animals.
Me too! He was a really strong and brave man.
It sounds like you come from a long line of strong and brave people.
I think so too! I'm proud of my family history.
That's great! I'm sure your family is proud of you too.
